name: Sylvan Free Shavacado
text:
2+ Plant monsters, including a level 5 or higher "Sylvan" monster
This card gains the original ATK of all face-up Plant-Type monsters on your side of the field. During the Main Phase: You can add 1 "Sylvan" card from your Deck to your hand. (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Sylvan" monster from your hand, and if you do, you can negate the effects of a monster with ATK lower than the Special Summoned monster. You can only activate each effect of "Sylvan Free Shavacado" once per turn.
